---
title: "Bloom"
date: "2005-02-03"
categories: [poem]
fields: [date, title]
toc: true
---

Velvet-like violet<br>
erupts<br>
in a riot<br>
on miniscule<br>
white canvases<br>
harp-like;<br>
focused at<br>
a bunch of seeds.<br>

All trouble<br>
to no avail,<br>
one day the bee will come<br>
and take it all away.<br>
